name: libtins
short_description:
************************** NOTE **************************
The project has been moved to github. The code will still be pushed regularly to this repository, but at some point this page will be closed. So please visit the project's github page to get the latest source code:

https://github.com/mfontanini/libtins

***********************************************************

libtins is a multiplatform C++ network packet crafting and sniffing library. It provides a high level, object oriented interface and handles every protocol's internals for you.
summary: C++ network packet crafting, sniffing and interpretation library.
